== Pre-Installed Freescale MX5 Images ==

This page links to the processes of using the MX5 preinstalled images for i.MX53 based boards on different Ubuntu releases.

=== Desktop Images ===

==== Oneiric Ocelot (11.10) ====

* Images can be downloaded at: http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/oneiric/release/ubuntu-11.10-preinstalled-desktop-armel+mx5.img.gz

* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ARM/MX5/QuickStart | Installation Instructions for the MX5 Quickstart board]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricOcelot/ReleaseNotes | Oneiric Known issues and release notes]]</nowiki>
